full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BLA RGYUD GSOL 'DEBS TSIGS BCAD DU RANG GIS GRVA BA RNAMS KYIS RGYUN DU BSKANG NGA'I SNGON CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS 'DON RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZER BA'I BLO DANG BSTUN, CHOS KYI THA SHAL BA SKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PAS, 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MA RIG GNAS LNGA LA MA RMONGS SHING MKHYEN PA RGYAS PA'I KOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN DANG, ZHI DAR PI LEG THU BLO BZANG RIG GROL RNAMS KYIS LHA MO'I BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS GTON CHOG ZHIG DGOS ZER BA'I BLO DANG LDAN PA PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSAN YIG DANG RANG GI LHA MO RJES GNAM THOB PA'I RGYUD RIM LTAR, CHOS KYI THA SHAL BA SKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS BDAG GI BSGRIGS PA LA, BLA LA LHA DANG SPYAN SNGAR MKHAS PA'I TSOGS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, YI GE PA NI ZHI DAR PI LIG THU BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,LEGS SO, ,)
